description: "Map of the residency of Ambon in the Maluku Islands, divided by colour-coded administrative borders. There are inset maps the Banda Islands—including the nutmeg plantations and the town of Neira with its fort and hospital—and of Dutch New Guinea."
title: "Kaart van't noordwestelijke gedeelte der Residentie Ambon. [Insets] Kaart van Nederlandsch Nieuw-Guinea at 1:4,000,000: Kaart van de voornaamste Banda Eilanden at 1:78,000 [cartographic material]."
